lead_paragraph: KIRBY--Winston Lawrence Born in New York, NY April 7, 1918 died Friday March 11, 2016 in Chapel Hill, North Carolina. He was an Army veteran, and avid tennis player, and member of the Unitarian Church. He married June Campfield August 27, 1949. He obtained his master's degree from Columbia University and spent his career in broadcasting and education. He is survived by his wife of 66 years, June C Kirby; sons, Neil and L.J. Kirby; grandsons, Jack and Dean Kirby; and nephews, Jeff, Eric, Dave, and Hugh. 1/3
